content: We’ve been working hard here at Split Rock Resort! Come see all of our changes including the new food court, digital theater showing the very best in first-run movies, and two new restaurants. The Split Rock Grill serves the best in traditional family fare. The Lake View Tavern offers handcrafted, modern American cuisine overlooking Lake Harmony. We’ve also completely renovated our main lobby, upgraded our guest rooms in the historic lakeside lodge, and much more! This summer promises to be one to remember. We can’t wait to welcome you back to Split Rock!
